name: Street Ganger
description: Bottom-rung gang muscle. Cheap chrome, cheaper guns, and something to prove. Dangerous in numbers, fodder alone.

abilities.name: Mob Courage
abilities.description: Gains +1 to attack rolls for each ally within 5m. Loses this bonus and must make morale check if outnumbered.

behavior.tactics: Swarm and overwhelm. No real coordination. Will use dirty tricks if desperate.
behavior.morale: Flees when reduced to half HP or when leader goes down. Surrenders easily if cornered alone.
behavior.motivation: Respect. Territory. Next fix. Proving they're hard enough to move up.

notes:
The cannon fodder of the sprawl. Use in groups of 4-8. They're not a threat individually, but action economy is realâ€”enough mooks can overwhelm even a chromed-up solo.

Good for:
- Random encounters
- Gang territory disputes
- Distractions while the real threat moves in
